compliance_scores.title: Risk Management System
findings: No formal risk management process documented
compliance_scores.gap_description: The organization has no structured risk management system. Informal notes exist but do not meet Article 9 requirements for a documented, maintained lifecycle process.

compliance_scores.title: Data and Data Governance
findings: Training data has no demographic representation analysis
No bias detection process in place
compliance_scores.gap_description: Training data lacks bias analysis and demographic representation checks. No data governance framework exists. High risk of discriminatory outcomes in hiring decisions.

compliance_scores.title: Technical Documentation
compliance_scores.gap_description: Partial documentation exists but is outdated and incomplete. Model cards and limitation disclosures are missing entirely.

compliance_scores.title: Record-Keeping and Logging
findings: Basic application logs exist but no decision audit trail
Log retention policy is 30 days (minimum required: 6 months)
compliance_scores.gap_description: Logging infrastructure exists but does not capture decision-level audit trails. Retention period is far below the required minimum.

compliance_scores.title: Transparency and Information Provision
findings: No explainability of screening decisions provided to candidates
No transparency notice to job applicants
Confidence scores not exposed to recruiters
compliance_scores.gap_description: Candidates are not informed that AI is being used in screening. No explainability features exist. This is a fundamental rights concern under GDPR and EU AI Act.

compliance_scores.title: Human Oversight
findings: Recruiters can manually review candidates but process is not enforced
No human oversight training program exists
compliance_scores.gap_description: Human review capability exists in the UI but is not enforced or documented as a formal control. No training ensures reviewers understand AI limitations.

compliance_scores.title: Accuracy, Robustness and Cybersecurity
findings: Accuracy benchmarks exist but not formally approved
No adversarial testing has been performed
No fallback procedures if model fails
compliance_scores.gap_description: Some accuracy metrics exist but adversarial robustness and current cybersecurity posture are unvalidated. No fallback plan if the model produces erroneous output.

compliance_scores.title: Obligations of Providers
findings: Not registered in EU AI database
No quality management system in place
compliance_scores.gap_description: No formal provider obligations have been met. This system cannot legally operate in the EU market in its current state.

compliance_scores.title: Obligations of Deployers
findings: No Data Protection Impact Assessment (DPIA) completed
No Fundamental Rights Impact Assessment performed
Staff AI literacy training not conducted
compliance_scores.gap_description: Deployer obligations largely unmet. DPIAs and fundamental rights assessments are missing, creating significant legal exposure.

compliance_scores.title: Post-Market Monitoring
findings: No bias drift detection in production
compliance_scores.gap_description: No structured monitoring exists post-deployment. The system has no mechanism to detect performance degradation or emerging bias in production.
